trade.description: Busy market crossroad that attracts merchants from surrounding regions.

government.description: Seat of administration with regulated trade and permit requirements.

metalworking.description: Skilled forges and workshops raise metal throughput and quality.

boatbuilding.description: Shipyards and docks requiring constant timber and tool supplies.

subsistence.description: Local production barely covers resident needs; little surplus for trade.

mine.description: Active mining operations generating bulk ore shipments.

agriculture.description: Extensive farmland providing consistent harvest commodities.

fort.description: Military garrisons demanding arms, armor, and provisions.

smuggling.description: Shadow markets deal in illicit goods and cut-rate prices.

piracy.description: Coastal raiders moving hot cargo through back channels.

wine_quality.description: Region known for producing high-quality wines and spirits.
